website_summaries.verdict: If you need a basic cookware set with a few nice features and an affordable price, this is the one to get.
pros: Affordable set that includes five practical pieces
Thermospot technology guides you in achieving appropriate cook temperatures
cons: Non-stick coating works well, but may begin to chip and peel over time
A bit less durable than pricier sets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pan set
customer_reviews.text: Nice pan set. good quality and reasonable value for money. I would be careful when using them on induction hobs though as I managed to warp the frying pan. From reading Tefal's blurb, they do say not to put them straight on a high heat and let them get too hot as they can do this. Unfortunately the frying pan now does not connect fully with the hob (see pic), which obviously will impact on how well it heats on the hob.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Aspinall

customer_reviews.title: The coating peels off!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this set. We have had ours for a few years now but have been forced to throw them away as the coating on the outside is peeling off and some of the inside too! It did not give me confidence that we were not eating the non-stick! We have had to buy a replacement set so it feels like this was a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Linings disentigrate. Guarantee worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Quite apart from the non-stick linings coming away from the pan, the frying pan has warped so it no longer sits on the hob without a wobble. We phoned the 'guarantee' phone line only to be told that the pan can warp "with high temperatures"!!! What??? Isn't that what frying pans are for?? We were then told we could ship (at our expense) the items back for them to review and decide if they would replace them. So... we go without any pans for as long as it takes them to decide if the pans that are clearly not fit for purpose have failed?? Steer clear! We regret not reading other peoples reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mark Weedon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I've just bought an induction hob which I've never experienced before so had to buy the these pans. They work very well with no cold spots while heating. I chose Tefal because I've used it for years and it's easy to clean. Unfortunately these pans should not be put in a dishwasher. Even so they're very easy to clean in the sink and quicker than a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: P. Aldaya

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality pans to avoid
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality pans. I purchased these less than 6 months ago, the non stick has largely worn off from the centre of all 3 of the saucepans which is a little concerning - I don’t know if it has worn off when cleaning or cooking, so I dread to think the amount of it we have inadvertently eaten. I wouldn’t buy again or recommend, stick to stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSmalls

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The nonstick layer starting disappearing quick with the pots and peeling off with one of the pans. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose in induction hobs
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of thermo spot for years, then we went to an induction hob and bought the new induction compatable set. Wow what rubbish! The frying pans have all warped, then after being in the heat straighten up and then cool all warped. The nonstic in the saucepans has all bubbled up and flaked up. These are not fit for purpose and Tefal needs to do something about this. AVOID at all costs!! We are now looking for proper induction compatable pans.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pans all the black coating is peeling off from the inside and outside. Had to throw several away as cannot cook food in them because of the flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: Distorted bases after 3 monthes
customer_reviews.text: We have used Tefal cookware for 50 odd years and never had any problems .The set we had last October is the worst we have ever had .Both frying pans have badly distorted bases .We had the set for use on our new Induction hob that needs flat bottoms .They tell you in book dont over heat but there frying pans .You heat them up then cook the food .We got a couple of cheap pans from Sainsburys that are made for induction and they haven't distorted .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. J. Orme

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality surface
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July 2017, now need to be replaced, despite careful usage and storing. No metal implements used, not stacked on each other, and no dishwasher cleaning, yet the non-stick surface has worn away in just over two years. suspect it's just down to the quality of the non-stick surface, as rest of the pans still solid.
customer_reviews.author: Alliance NW6

customer_reviews.title: Defo not premium avoid!
customer_reviews.text: These are very poor the coating already started to peel on one of the pans after 9 months of use. In touch with CS but this is too much grief. Will just buy new ones defo not this brand. These not premium brand for sure avoid and go for better ones. Ps we only use silicon spoons and hand wash not dish wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mr V Chudasama

customer_reviews.title: so bad that we are about to throw them away
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money: 1. those pans have very sharp edges and should not be advertised as safe to use on induction hob. We have scratched our new hob first day and then I have to use sand paper to remove rough parts 2. the quality is quite poor for brand like tefal - the handles get very hot after 5-10 min cooking 3. we seems to have a problem to get right induction - they seems to work randomly and hob is struggling to get right contact (we don't have this problem with any other pans)
customer_reviews.author: Marcelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pans, look good but for some reason did not work with my induction hob. I had the hob manufactures engineer out and in the end they changed the hob, exactly the same results, takes an age to boil water and you can't use 2 pans on the same side of the hob. Turns out it was the pans. Spoke with Amazon on the online chat, who I have to say were absolutely first class, customer service as it should be and I returned the pans and then purchased Prestige Stainless steel induction pans and they boil the same quantity of water 3 times quicker. Problem solved the hob now works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Peeling Pan Pain
customer_reviews.text: As the others have said the coating on this pan peels very easily. I've had mine for around two years and the boiling pan surface coating is shedding. I've never used metal utensils to stir simply out of habit. Such a shame because Tefal is a big name and the expectation of quality is there when in reality it isn't. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nixor

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Loverly pans, but they are very heavy, too heavy for me, and when I cook food, they always make a rim around them for some reason. They will last for years no doubt, but for someone like me who has very bad Arthritis., they are too heavy. My fault should have sent them back and explained I did make a big mistake, that does not make them bad pans, but if buying they are not for people over 70yrs with disabilities.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Fry pan warps
customer_reviews.text: After six months, the frying pan warped severely. They were replaced (and I had to send the whole set back even though the rest of it was fine). After another six months, the new frying pan has warped severely. After two attempts to contact Tefal, they still haven't replied. Amazon won't allow another return.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davies

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and products work really well
customer_reviews.text: Over one year on now and the products are still just as good as new. Both the pans and the saucepans are able to be washed in the dishwasher ensuring any grease or tough residue is wiped before. The pans have held up extremely well and for the price I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tyla Childs

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The fry pans are terrible. From the first month of use the non-stick coating stopped being non-stick and even an egg sticks on it. We have to throw it away. Edited: About 1 year and we have to throw away all the pans because the coating has pealed off, one pan has rust on it and this is not a result of a very heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was actually expecting more.
customer_reviews.text: One of the frying pans (the big one) wasn't "flat" so it was spinning without the load which is really annoying and you can't use it with a single hand. Also 2 pots started loosing it's non-stick coating very quickly - after weeks (we were very careful with the pots, always used only wooden spatulas and haven't ever had any other pots that lost the coating so quickly). The small frying pan and one of pots work totally fine after more 1.5 years) I wouldn't call it premium.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid pans.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my old set of tefal pans as i had just got a new induction hob. These work perfectly, nice and solid, heat up quickly and best still are very easy to clean. Used them quite a few times now and seem to be quite durable. Its a shame a wok isnt included, but the frying pan isnt a bad size.
customer_reviews.author: Jackinbox

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: We bought the same set 2.5years ago. Lots of scratches formed over time at the base of pots from daily usage so we decided to replace the set. The new set came with a faulty pot that leaks water at the base. Not sure it’s bad luck we got a faulty set or the quality of make has reduced overtime. Anyway, it was replaced and would still recommend this set for its price. I use it daily for cooking meals for our small family.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: DIsappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pans seemed well designed, looked very good and were not too heavy. They were detected by the induction hob, but the sensor suggested they would not work efficiently , so unfortunately we returned them before actually using them. They would have worked but would have taken longer to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement set for what had been a long lasting set of pans. Even upon opening the box the quality could be felt by the weight & sturdiness of the pans. Having now used them a few times, they are solid in construction, easy to clean & overall are fantastic. A good range of pan sizes in this set that are suitable for most meals. A happy Tefal customer 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Over the moon with these. Excellent packaging when they arrived, very sturdy and good quality. We are really pleased and they are excellent value for money. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a long life
customer_reviews.text: 15mths old and I have had to throw them. All the non stick coating is peeling off. Buy cheaper ones and replace every year much more cost effective. Bought another brand for 50quid a set and theyre much better pans
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well made and excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: As the title says these pans are well made and excellent value although they have risen in price since my purchase. We have just purchased a new induction hob and was a bit worried as some reviewers said some or all the pans didn't work. So to be sure I tested every pan on every hob to make sure both hobs and pans worked, no problem with any pan on any hob so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Quality cookware
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our induction hob, struggling with old cookware but now wondering why we waited. you can feel the quality and any lack of concentration whilst cooking is compensated by the non stick that performs 100%. Excellent seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, handles do get hot
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality, as you would expect from tefal. The handles on the glass lids are made of a kind of rubber material that can get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but good
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. Work perfectly on our new aeg induction hob. A lot heavier than normal pans though. Says don't dishwash but I have several time and they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value pans
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pots and pans. Would like to be able to purchase a larger one too. Easy to clean and non stick. Work well on our induction job.
customer_reviews.author: taylorlisa

customer_reviews.title: Metal is soft on these pants
customer_reviews.text: I use a storage rack to stack the pans. Occasionally one might fall off and fall Less than 2 feet to the ground and pans dent. I’ve never had that happen to any other plans I’ve bought .
customer_reviews.author: The hat

customer_reviews.title: Coating coming off
customer_reviews.text: In just a year the non stick coating has come off my pans. I have always washed them carefully with no harsh scooters used at all.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: A great induction set
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to clean. But watch the handles they get hotter then normal pans
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Quality pays.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are very good quality. My granddaughter was thrilled with them. They work well with her conduction hob, & do the business.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Tefal pan set
customer_reviews.text: Housewarming gift for my son and family and they love them
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Allott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality coating
customer_reviews.text: After a 5 months of use and only using wooden utensils so as not to scratch the non-stick coating, the coating is starting to bubble up and coating is coming off by itself. Very poor quality pans
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great supplier, great brand
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and have nothing to complaint after a couple of months of use. These saucepan set is great, too cheap for what it is... quality is great and cooking here is a pleasure! strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: New flat came with induction hob. Don't like the system especially if you cook alot. Pans do work fine and the quality, looks and weight in use are good.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Having bought Tefal products in the past, this set let me down a little. Perfect set for a studio apartment. The issues I got with mine are all lids do not insulate the water properly. Vapour and water always leaks out from the pans, no matter what temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of pans. Have only had them for a short while so can't say much about them, only that they work well on my new induction hob, they are very stirdy and have some weight to them. They are non stick too so so far so good. I have also put 2 of them through the dishwasher and they have come out well.
customer_reviews.author: melinanm

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice but heavy lol (maybe I’m used to the cheap ones only lol) I really like them, good quality and they are very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby R

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: As I had not seen these pans other than on the Amazon site I was slightly concerned about how they would look and feel. I needn't have worried as they really look the part. They are very heavy due I presume to the induction bottom on each of the pans but heavy pots are supposedly a good thing. I am absolutely delighted with this set and would not hesitate to recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Internal coating bubbled & peeled away in no time & frying pans warped.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed - not extensively used as they are in our holiday home, but the non-stick has bubbled on all three saucepans and both frying pans have warped. Would definitely NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cookware. Pots are solid and have a bit of weight about them. Great on my new induction job.
customer_reviews.author: Redmanstevo

customer_reviews.title: Best Tefal Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, even though they are a bit more expensive than other teal products I suggest to spend a bit more they will last for longer
customer_reviews.author: Marta Romero

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: very solid pan set,no problems with cleaning them.not cheap but decent value.
customer_reviews.author: kbg

customer_reviews.title: ... on a Hotpoint induction hob the saucepans are still fine but recently had to replace the large frying pan ...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years use on a Hotpoint induction hob the saucepans are still fine but recently had to replace the large frying pan as it was losing the non-stick capability. I bought the Tefal Preference Pro frying pan which looks better but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Owen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these pans
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pans, would have given then a 5 star rating, but they lose one star because of their weight. When full, you need two hands to pick them up, especially the larger sized one. I found a different branded product on Amazon for less price when buying a few more and prefer the weight of them, cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what they are, but a very good set.
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality set, easy to clean and feels like it will last a long time. A little on the heavy side, but that is to be expected with induction compatible cookware. A little on the expensive side though!
customer_reviews.author: V. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good cookware
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. No food sticking to the surface, really easy to clean. Don't scrub or use knives or forks on it, it will damage the coating. My stove is old induction stove, and I noticed difference when I started using these cookware. They are getting hotter faster.
customer_reviews.author: Antonela

customer_reviews.title: No good for ceramic hob as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: bought these as advert said could use on induction and ceramic hob, induction good, but when I used on my ceramic hob they scratched the glass,NOT HAPPY BUNNY.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christie

customer_reviews.title: Peels off
customer_reviews.text: I had a replacement set as the first started peeling off after 6 months. The same thing happened to the 2nd set. 8 months in and the coating is coming off, inside and out. Getting a refund and going to purchase cast iron instead - not from Tefal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harley

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with induction hobs
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be suitable for induction hobs but aren’t. Bought as a wedding present and just been told they don’t work (how embarrassing)! As I’m out of the returns window, I’m unable to return, so now stuck with pans that my friend can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: very good quality i bought a induction hob ten looked at pans etc,after realizing the cost of buying separates i spotted these .i have to say they are as good as it says ,a little on the heavy side but something i have got used to. easy to clean with a decent cloth and look very smart .i fully recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: mal1356

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great. We’ve been using them for about a year now and there’s hardly a mark on them. Very easy to clean - a bit of water and they almost clean themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for induction
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set of pans which were bought after I converted to induction hob. I had previously been buying pans suitable but lacked some to replace the non-stick saucepans. I forget how much this set cost but very good weight and quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. LANGLEY

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are perfect for an induction hob And so easy to clean. They’re a good weight and look lovely. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately these pans were unsuitable for my Bosch induction hob ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these pans were unsuitable for my Bosch induction hob although they are advertised as for Induction hobs. According to the Bosch engineer who pointed this out to me it is to do with the quality of the base of the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Ormerod

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best pans I've used - I usually struggle to find pans which will work on my induction hob but these work like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: honeyblondecm

customer_reviews.title: better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this. Works on both induction and gas hob.
customer_reviews.author: Neera Goel

customer_reviews.title: Useless product
customer_reviews.text: The so called non-stick coating is peeling off of the outside of the 18 cm saucepan, the other pans are all chipped (not from misuse) and they don't all work on the rings of my induction hob. Waste of money don't bother to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: I suggest avoiding these
customer_reviews.text: Had the pans for less than a year and the coating in the pan is coming off. The coating in the large pan is bubbling, the coating in the medium pan is coming off. Really disappointing for Tefal.
customer_reviews.author: Stee

customer_reviews.title: Great do the job!
customer_reviews.text: we moved house and there was an induction cooker so we needed to get new pots quick. good price for a set. It would have been good if the frying pans were slightly bigger or a saute pan with lid was included but overall for the basics these have been great and have held up well. no problems with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product - base buckles after use
customer_reviews.text: Do not but Tefal products with the red hotspot - they are not of merchantable quality. After use for 1 year or so the base buckles for some reason. Tefal will replace once but not thereafter.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use with my new induction hob. They feel good in the hand, are a nice weight and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kodlum

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with the product! Easy to clean, nice size! perfect for my family
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pans for a couple or small family ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pans for a couple or small family say of 4. Had them quite a while now and the none stick is as good as new still
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Coating comes off quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Nov 2018 and coating has come off already and I’ve only ever hand washed these and never used metal utensils!
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on induction hob
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these pots just after getting a new cooker with induction hob. Very sturdy and high quality but do not work with induction.
customer_reviews.author: Caoimhe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, worthy the money
customer_reviews.text: As described, work well with my induction hob. Good weight. Good set of pans
customer_reviews.author: Dawn123

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this purchase. Sturdy saucepans with tefal non stick surface. Lids and handles good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alison T.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for induction
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant and kept in good condition with induction cookery. Providing the use of plastic utensils to cook with. Heats food well and thorough without the usual burning and improper heat that you get with usual cheap induction pans.
customer_reviews.author: NayaRiu

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: As an induction hob was new to me and was I worried that I had the correct saucepans I found them excellent
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tatham

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: These pans are not cheap, but the price clearly reflects the quality of the product. They work a treat on our new induction cooker, and they are very well made and look like they will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased arrived sooner than I thought. Good quality. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Pots and Pans
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough pots and pans, does what it says on the tin and warms your food
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Pans started to peel inside after only 6 months. Frying pans had to be scrapped even before that. I paid €85 at the time. I'll never buy tefal again. Such a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Spot on, nice and heavy, arrived sooner than i thought and seem well built. A good domestic standard as an ex chef i know they will last a fair while so happy days.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bloggs

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have used these pans a lot since I purchased them. They are a good weight, and the non stick is so much better than the normal tefal range. I bought them for our new induction hob, and I`m glad I did. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wife very pleased so I must be. I didn't realise the pain of the open-wallet surgery for pans when we bought the induction hob. This was the best deal around
customer_reviews.author: Hodgie

customer_reviews.title: They are so easy to clean as
customer_reviews.text: Solid heavy pans that work a treat. I've looked to buy an extra saucepan on it's own but finding it hard to find one. They are so easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: LilyD

customer_reviews.title: Have lasted ages without too much issue
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy these when we got an induction hob & they've lasted us very well over the five or so years.
customer_reviews.author: Hansi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !!!
customer_reviews.text: This set are excellent quality and very good value for money, its a pity they don't have a larger pot included in the set. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David Fitzsimons

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, guaranteed not to warp. After using them twice, they've warped and can no longer be used! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Little

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cook set for induction hob
customer_reviews.text: Really good cook set. A little pricey but all in all really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Neil P.

customer_reviews.title: Not over impressed with these
customer_reviews.text: Great to start with although the larger frying pan base had slightly curved after only 2 months use making it not ideal for induction cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kyalmusic

customer_reviews.title: Good set of pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Heavy good set of Tefal pots and pans. Can't go wrong. Wish the pans were larger but overall a good set.
customer_reviews.author: penguin246

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic pans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pans, easy to use and ergonomic. Great value for money due to purchasing during the Black Friday event.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jane Hawes

customer_reviews.text: I always buy Tefal the none stick is a must, I have given my latest ones to the Charity shop,as they are still in excellent order. I am about to buy an induction hob hence the need to change.
customer_reviews.author: Lainy

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to clean, would have liked one size larger pan and smaller milk pan in the set but guess I can buy them separately. One thing to watch out for are rough edges on base of pans, found out too late after they scratched my new induction hob and worktop!! ( not a happy bunny!) A rub round with new scourer or brillo pad before use should help. Otherwise a nice set of pans.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set and they work perfectly on my induction hob
customer_reviews.author: Eoghan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my original legal some of the coating has come off
customer_reviews.author: bridget russel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Having bought a new induction hob I needed a new set of cookware. These were perfect and great value.
customer_reviews.author: K Allan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this set of pans
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set of pans. It's great value for the money: perfect non-sticky coating, resisting even my flatmate attempts to cut a steak in the frying pan, uniform and fast heating, fits perfectly in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy product . Not the best I have found for using on induction hob. The smallest pan takes ages to boil hot water for pasta etc. Not the best value for money as they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jakki H.

customer_reviews.title: Induction cooware
customer_reviews.text: On your had these pans a few weeks so can't give a true review. They look smart and do the job. Quick delivery and good price
customer_reviews.author: Linda Boland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good products. But they don't like being washed when hot - likely to buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Dec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy i would say the handles are very GOOD to handle i would recommend to BUY
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Gorn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these - they are great to use, and very easy to keep clean (do not put them in the dishwasher). The small frying pan seems to have become slightly warped - not sure why, but otherwise fine. Would have liked an extra pan - big wok-type pan would be very useful, had to buy this elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Madi McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great pan set and hand wash with ease, fab on induction hob.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

Suitable for all heat sources including induction
